mapper.select: SELECT article.title atitle, article.id aid, article.description adescription, article.tag atag, article.gmt_create agmtCreate, `user`.avatar_url uavatarUrl, `user`.name uname, details.comment_count dcommentCount, details.view_count dviewCount, details.reply_count dreplyCount, details.like_count dlikeCount FROM article LEFT JOIN `user`ON article.creator=`user`.id LEFT JOIN details ON article.id=details.id where article.id=details.id ORDER BY article.gmt_create DESC Limit #{page},#{size}
